com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.NumberArrayField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<BufferMap.NumberField>
        • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.NumberArrayField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferMap.StringField
    Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.NumberArrayField
extends BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<BufferMap.NumberField>
    Class for representing a field that is simply an array of numbers. Similar to BufferField, but can be used to represent an array of Integers (4 bytes each) for instance

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractArrayField

      • Fields inherited from class com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField

      • BufferMap.NumberArrayField

        protected BufferMap.NumberArrayField(java.lang.String name,
                          int elementSizeInBytes,
                          Buffer.Signedness signedness,
                          boolean verboseOutput)
        Constructor for when the array has an unknown number of elements. Calling constructor MUST call finalizeArray() inside their constructor once the number of elements has been determined
        Parameters:
        name - name of array
        elementSizeInBytes - size in bytes of each number within the array
        signedness - whether or not each element in the array is signed or unsigned
        verboseOutput - true prints each element on it's own line, false print all elements on a single line

      • BufferMap.NumberArrayField

                          Buffer.Signedness signedness)
        Constructor. verboseOutput is false
        Parameters:
        name - name of array

        public BufferMap.NumberArrayField(java.lang.String name,
                          int elementSizeInBytes,
                          boolean verboseOutput)

        name - name of array
